title: Launch
description: Read about the launch at https://medium.com/mycrypto/introducing-defiscan-io-40b8d2c3d445

title: Uniswap numbers fixed
description: Fixed an issue that incorrectly calculated the pool value and pool share

title: Added public changelog
description: The changelog is now public, displayed in this drawer!

title: Search box clearing
description: Converted the input to a search type to have better experience for mobile users

title: Allow own node querying
description: If you are viewing Defiscan that injects a Web3 instance, it will use that instance - no need to trust a node that Defiscan uses by default. Notice of using injected web3 instance is displayed in the footer.

title: USD Pricing
description: You can now see the USD value of your holdings and total pool sizes! Pricing feeds are fetched from nomics and cached in an API.
